job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtmylo is a fastgrowing insurtech leader with an embeddable digital insurance platform that enables our partners to offer expert coverage advice and solutions to their clients our proprietary technology the mind of mylo delivers precise coverage recommendations to business owners and individuals it matches risks with carrier appetites and determines the right insurance at the best value from multiple leading carriers for a wide variety of needs including business small group benefits home auto life individual health and medicareltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtbacked by global investor guggenheim partners and the worlds largest independent broker lockton and drawing on years of lockton insurance expertise mylo offers expert insurance recommendations online or over the phone with licensed agents more information about mylo can be found at wwwchoosemylocomltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtwe are revolutionizing insurance to protect what part of a relatively small development team youll have ownership over technology and architectural decisions and be given high level business problems to solve with code youll be able to see the
